alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Edwards; Kerr; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bandera, west central Kerr, southwestern Edwards and Real Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lost Maples State Natural Area to 8 miles east of Carta Valley. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leakey, Vanderpool, Camp Wood, Barksdale, Tuff, Lost Maples State Natural Area, Vance, Carta Valley and Prade Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
